name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.200.0
- Last set of new cards before Steam release
- Added 18 cards: B.Skull Dragon, Darkfire Dragon, Empress Mantis, Grasschopper, Jinzo, Levia-Dragon, Man-Eater Bug, Ocean Dragon Lord, Predaplant Chimerafflesia, Predaplant Chlamydosundew, Predaplant Drosophyllum, Predaplant Flytrap, Predaplant Pterapenthes, Predaplant Sarraceniant, Predaplant Spinodionaea, Predapruning, Tri-Horned Dragon, Wiretap
- Added Plant keyword
- Added Predaplant keyword
- Various balancing adjustments
- Fixed and properly added Dragon Capture Jar

v1.182.0
- Added 4 new cards: Basic Insect, Gigaplant, Super Solar Nutrient, Metal Dragon



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
